name: Chessy Knights
description:
Chessy-knight 

a chess-like game:

You can battle a person locally in this 2p chess like game. Select a unit, move and attack. You Must kill the king to win. Every turn you'll earn money from your village. With money you can buy more units. Will you be victorious?

Use SPACE to change player.

Use right click to see stats.

Use left click to select unit.
